name: Ameen Karim
text: When you describe a fast service pizza place, you have to treat it exactly like that. The staff is nice, sometimes they don't get the portions right for a good pizza (too much sauce/cheese, etc). This ruins the experience. Their cheese ball â€¦More

name: Jon von Ahnen
text: My favorite eatery on campus!  But could you all stop reaching over the glass with your dirty hands to point at what toppings you want?!  Just tell the nice people...they'll make it happen!  Tasty pizza, friendly employees...but really busy during peak times.  It's good, so that's predictable : )

name: Maribeth Capelli
text: Got the Keto crust red vino pizza with sausage on it. It was decent. Crust was very thin and was crumbly and couldn't hold the weight of the already light pizza. Paid $13 and was a small meal split between 2 people. Decent for having keto on demand. There are still some carbs in it though. Staff was good.

name: satish shah
text:
I was able to get vegan pizza. The taste was delicious
Service was very good. Highly recommend the place.

name: Erika Hardie
text: It's good pizza. Can't say it's worth the long wait. It's small space. There's a long line. Overall decent pizza. Good to at least try but out.

name: Calvio Parejas
text: My wife love this place.  Great keto dough with options. They also have gluten free base.

name: Thompson Bobby
text: Not easy to get to or to find reasonable parking being on a college campus. Third time it's been closed despite hours listed as being open. Terribly disappointing because I liked their food when I had it in Chicago. We're done trying :(

name: D J
text: Best pizza ever if you go to this blaze location it in the middle of the university an you have to park and walk to the pizza adventureðŸ¤—

name: Caterina Hickey
text: Many different sauces and deserts.  Margherita pizza a must-try item in their menu.

name: Alina Garcia
text: Pizza and breadsticks are alright because there is an overwhelming presence of oil. I couldnâ€™t eat the entire pizza because the oil was too fattening. However the flavor was still good. The staff were attentive when explaining how the service works.

name: Joseph Walter
text: Some of the best pizza in this area. I like it more when they reheat the pizza in the store, it gives the slices a better crust.

name: PANCHO LLENADO
text: Beats all chain pizza brands.  Simply delicious and you can even build your own pizza.  Their signature pizzas are really good.

name: Dexter Bushrod
text: Good pizza with a great choice of variety. Quite affordable as well.

name: Meredith Mckim
text: Wonderful flavors and nice atmosphere. Certainly worth a visit if your in the area.

name: Redemptiontech
text: Yee pizza had some nice cheese on that daddy oven. Oh boy was I satisfied with all them thicc cookies that was coming out of yinz hot ovens oh boy oh boy

name: Brendon Thomas
text: Really the only place to get good pizza on campus. Top notch for campus food options

name: Phong
text: Friendly staff, and best of all, a fairly low price for an unlimited toppings pizza!

name: Sebastian Foye
text: The staff are super friendly, there are build your own options, and vegan options.

name: Que Ford
text: Not very keto friendly

name: Charles Coffey
text: Super friendly staff

name: Emmanuel Houston
text: Best pizza ever

name: Gabster
text: I can't say much about the pizza they serve here but the special soda they have is delicious.

name: Rodrick Edmund Brown
text: Used the restroom.

name: Aakriti Garg
text: Love it

name: Adam Protter
text: If you're traveling through the area, this blaze is located within a university campus building and is not a stand alone restaurant.

name: Glenie Smith
text: Good pizza

name: Daniel Mushi
text: Love it

name: bharat kumar
text: Best pizza

name: Sameh Atef
text: Love it
